feature.name: Superior Darkvision
feature.shortDescription: Within 120' can see in dim light as bright, in darkness as dim(greyscale).

feature.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
feature.shortDescription: Disadvantage on attack rolls and perception checks when you or target are in direct sunlight.

feature.name: Faerie Fire
feature.shortDescription: Each object in a 20 foot cube within a 60 foot range is outlined in blue, green, or violet. Any creature failing a dexterity saving throw is also outlined. Any attack against creature has advantage if attacker sees the target. Lasts while concentrating, for up to 1 minute.

feature.name: Darkness
feature.shortDescription: Magical darkness spreads from a point within a 60 feet range, to fill a 15 foot radius for up to ten minutes, while concentrating.
